note: Formal education is primary/ISCED 1 or higher. This does not include years spent repeating grades. Data for the average years of schooling for years before 2015 are estimates, while data from 2015 onwards are projections. GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Average years of schooling vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The average years of schooling completed by individuals aged 25 and older. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
